test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test (uint32 UInt32, n_uint32 Nullable(UInt32), lc LowCardinality(String), n_lc LowCardinality(Nullable(String))) ENGINE=File(Arrow) SETTINGS output_format_arrow_low_cardinality_as_dictionary=1
test.fill_query: insert into test select number, number, toString(number % 10000), toString(number % 10000) from numbers(20000000)
test.query: SELECT uint32 from test format Null
SELECT n_uint32 from test format Null
SELECT lc from test format Null
SELECT n_lc from test format Null
